key_reset_success: You have successfully reset your password
key_discover_a_new: Discover a new way to communicate with friends and colleagues, where every conversation can be analyzed by AI to determine emotions and tone.
key_ai_analyzes_the: AI analyzes the text and provides accurate information about the mood and emotions of the speaker.
key_your_messages_are: Your messages are protected using modern encryption technologies.
key_user_friendly_interface: A user-friendly and intuitive interface for communication without unnecessary settings.
key_error_400: Your request could not be processed. Please check the input data.
key_error_404: The requested resource was not found.
key_error_401: You need to log in to access this page.
key_error_403: You do not have permission to access this page.
key_error_500: Server error. Please try again later.
key_operator_details: Operator: FeelZChat, INN 1234567890, located at 123 Business Avenue, CityName, Russia. Contact: contact@example.com, +7 (XXX) XXX-XX-XX.
key_privacy_intro: 1.1 We highly value your privacy and guarantee that all personal data is processed in strict compliance with the requirements of the Federal Law No. 152-FL 'On Personal Data' of the Russian Federation and the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union. Our service is intended exclusively for individuals who have reached the age of majority (18 years and older). This Policy details what categories of data we collect, the purposes for which they are used, and the technical and organizational measures applied to protect them.
key_consent: 2.1 By using our website or providing information, you confirm that you have reached the age of majority (18 years and older) and give your voluntary, informed, and unambiguous consent for the collection, storage, and processing of your personal data in accordance with the terms of this Policy. You may withdraw your consent at any time via browser settings or by sending a request to contact@example.com.
key_data_processing_basis_1: 3.1 Your voluntary consent to process specific categories of data
key_data_processing_basis_2: 3.2 Fulfillment of a contract and provision of requested services
key_data_processing_basis_3: 3.3 Compliance with obligations to regulatory authorities
key_data_processing_basis_4: 3.4 Our legitimate interests (service quality improvement, internal audits)
key_cookie_consent_notice: 5.1 Our website uses cookies and similar technologies for proper functionality, remembering your preferences, and conducting analytics. By continuing to use the resource, you agree to cookie placement in accordance with our Cookie Policy. You may modify or withdraw your consent via browser settings or our cookie management section.
key_cookie_usage_purposes_1: 5.2.1 Technical: Ensuring website functionality and user authentication (until session ends)
key_cookie_usage_purposes_2: 5.2.2 Analytical: Collecting statistics on visits and user behavior (up to 30 days)
key_cookie_usage_purposes_3: 5.2.3 Functional: Remembering user preferences (language, interface settings)
key_cookie_usage_purposes_4: 5.2.4 Advertising: Displaying targeted ads (with your explicit consent)
key_data_usage_4: 7.4 Protection against fraud and unauthorized access
key_data_usage_5: 7.5 Sending notifications and newsletters (with your consent)
key_data_usage_6: 7.6 Age verification during registration (to comply with age restrictions)
key_password_storage: — Passwords are stored encrypted using the bcrypt algorithm.
key_data_protection_2: 8.2 Encrypted storage of passwords and sensitive data (bcrypt, AES)
key_data_protection_3: 8.3 Multi-level access control and rights separation
key_data_sharing_1: 9.1 Third-party analytics services with your consent (SCC)
key_data_sharing_2: 9.2 Government and law enforcement agencies upon request
key_data_sharing_3: 9.3 Contractors and partners for service operations
key_russia_storage: 10.1 Servers located on Russian Federation territory
key_cross_border_transfer: 10.2 Only with your explicit consent or upon government request
key_cross_border_transfer_details: 10.2.1 Cross-border transfers comply with Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) approved by the European Commission.
key_standard_period: 11.1 Up to 2 years from last interaction
key_data_destruction: 11.3.1 Data is permanently deleted using industry-standard methods (e.g., DOD 5220.22-M) or anonymized irreversibly.
key_complaint_procedure: 12.9 If you believe your rights were violated, you may file a complaint with Roskomnadzor (https://pd.rkn.gov.ru) or the EU Data Protection Authority.
key_user_right_1: 12.1 Right to access data and obtain copies
key_user_right_2: 12.2 Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete data
key_user_right_3: 12.3 Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
key_user_right_4: 12.4 Right to withdraw consent at any time
key_user_right_6: 12.6 Right to object to processing based on legitimate interests
key_user_right_8: 12.8 Right to request deletion of data provided by a minor (via parent/guardian)
key_user_right_8_details: 12.8.1 Parents/guardians may request deletion by sending a notarized request to contact@example.com with proof of guardianship.
key_third_party_warning: We are not responsible for age restrictions imposed by third-party services (Google Analytics, Hotjar, etc.). Their usage is governed by their own privacy policies.
key_policy_changes: 14.1 We may update this Policy at any time. Key changes will be published on our website and sent to your email. Continued use of the website after updates implies acceptance of the new Policy version.
key_document_accessibility: This Policy is available in Russian and English and formatted for accessibility (screen readers, large print).
key_definitions: Definitions: 'Personal Data' — any information related to an identified or identifiable individual (per GDPR and FL-152). 'Processing' — any operation with personal data, including collection, storage, and use.
key_homepage_register_hint: On the homepage, click 'Register', enter your phone number and create a password.
key_forgot_password_hint: Forgot your password? What to do?
key_forgot_password_process: On the login page, click 'Forgot password?', enter your number, and we will send you a recovery code.
key_change_phone_hint: How to change your phone number?
key_change_phone_instruction: In your profile settings, go to 'Contact Information' and click 'Change number'.
key_account_delete_instruction: Contact support via /help or email support@FeelZChat.app, and we will delete your account.
key_messages_not_sending: My messages are not sending. What to do?
key_check_connection: Check your internet connection. If the problem persists, try logging out and back into the app.
key_messages_protected: Your messages are protected using modern encryption technologies.
key_your_question_example: Your question, for example: 'I want to delete my account'
key_your_question: Your question, for example: 'I want to delete my account'
key_meta_title: FeelZChat — Smart Messenger with AI Emotion Detection & NLP Technology
key_meta_description: FeelZChat is a cutting-edge messenger that uses AI and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to detect emotions in real time, enhancing your chat experience through intelligent sentiment analysis.
key_register_description: Sign up for FeelzChat and start chatting with friends and colleagues. Simple and quick registration process on the platform.
key_login_description: Log in to FeelzChat to start chatting with friends and colleagues. Enter your username and password for quick access.
key_chat_description: Chat in real-time with friends and colleagues through FeelzChat. Fast messaging, file sharing, and much more.
key_privacy_description: Read FeelzChat's privacy policy to learn how we protect your data and maintain your privacy.
key_help_description: Need help? Check out the FAQ section of FeelzChat to find answers to common questions about the platform.
key_home_description: Welcome to FeelzChat! Start chatting with friends and colleagues, send messages, and stay connected.
key_profile_description: Go to your FeelzChat profile to edit personal information, configure notifications, and manage privacy settings.
key_reset-password_description: Forgot your password? Restore access to your FeelzChat account with our password reset feature.
key_error_description: Error 404 — Page not found. Go back to the home page of FeelzChat or try again.
